basics.name: Kiran Bhattacharyya
basics.label: Machine Learning Scientist and Manager
basics.summary: AI/ML scientist, engineer, and manager with 10 years of experience in artificial intelligence and machine learning, specializing in image/video-based deep learning, vision-language reasoning systems, and clinical AI.

work.name: Intuitive Surgical, Inc.
work.summary: Led a team of ML Scientists and an ML manager, delivering critical production software and driving innovation in surgical AI and LLM-based systems. Led the development and release of machine learning capabilities for the new da Vinci 5 system. Successfully deployed into production multi-modal agentic systems in a HIPAA-compliant environment and trained vision-language models on surgical video data prototyping natural language interactions with surgical video.

work.name: Intuitive Surgical, Inc.
work.summary: Spearheaded the development of deep learning models for activity recognition using video and kinematics data with Python, PyTorch, and TensorFlow. Successfully deployed advanced video deep learning models to production building reliable, scalable, and maintainable AI systems.
